scenario_text.value:
So Agumon, can you detect any signs of
Labramon?
Um, not in this immediate area...
Oh my gosh!
What is it, Agumon?
Takuma, look! Over there, on the ground!
Footprints! Two different sets of them!

The footprints have different shapes...
These must be Labramon’s?

I think you’re right! So they’ve made it
back to the school area. What a relief!
But these prints are weird, Takuma...
Weird? Like how?
The footprints are facing backwards!
Now that you mention it...

(The footprints look like they’re going in
the opposite direction from the school.)
Maybe...they got lost?

There’s no way they got lost if Labramon is
with her.
Yeah, true...
(But why then?)

(Whatever, there’s no use questioning it
now.)

(It’s not like Aoi to run off by herself in
the first place.)

(But I guess that’s because she was in so
much shock after what happened...)

I don’t know what’s going on here, Takuma,
but I have a bad feeling about it.
Same...

We need to find her before something bad
happens... Something feels really off.
We need to find Aoi fast!
Hey, Takuma! I brought everyone here!
Oh! Hey, Kaito! Hey, everyone!
You guys find Aoi yet?!
No, just her footprints...

If we follow her footprints we should find
her, right?
Then let’s get moving and follow them to her.
Something bad might happen if we don’t hurry.
You think so too, Renamon?

I sense something sinister in the direction
the footprints lead...
(Agumon said the same thing...)

Maybe it’s because of that injured bad guy
I saw stumbling around?
You mean he might be near her?!
It’s possible.

Well, talking isn’t gonna help. Let’s go
after her already!
Right. Come on, everyone!
